Articles.Content:
So I've made this little structural part and I've run into a problem with Unity not wanting to export the file. I got the part tools to export it to .mu but when I try it doesn't end up in the folder it's suppose to go to? Any suggestions?![jUp6u5w.png](http://i.imgur.com/jUp6u5w.png)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-11T20:00:51Z" title="07/11/2015 08:00  PM" data-short="9 yr">July 11, 2015</time> by Recognize-Me-**
Where does it put it ? looks like it went to MyNewPart
It says it went to MyNewPart but then nothing is in that folder

> 
> It says it went to MyNewPart but then nothing is in that folder

Did you set up your GameData directory under the Unity PartTools?

> 
> Did you set up your GameData directory under the Unity PartTools?

Not quite sure what you mean but If it's what I think then yes

What is the full path to the MyNewPart folder in which you want to put the part? You may want to check the Unity project directory to see if that's where it's putting the part. If you manually typed in the File URL I would suggest using the "Set" button and navigate through the dialogue to the directory in which you want the part.

> 
> What is the full path to the MyNewPart folder in which you want to put the part? You may want to check the Unity project directory to see if that's where it's putting the part. If you manually typed in the File URL I would suggest using the "Set" button and navigate through the dialogue to the directory in which you want the part.

Using the "Set" button instead of typing it out mad it create a new Folder but it worked and I found it

> 
> Using the "Set" button instead of typing it out mad it create a new Folder but it worked and I found it

Glad you were able to get it to work. Happy modding.
